aws::graph::propositions: # Amazon's Supply Chain Dependencies and Risks
Amazon relies on a limited group of suppliers for semiconductor products.
Amazon's semiconductor suppliers include providers of graphics processing units.
Graphics processing units are products related to artificial intelligence infrastructure.
Constraints on semiconductor product availability could adversely affect Amazon's ability to develop artificial intelligence technologies.
Constraints on semiconductor product availability could adversely affect Amazon's ability to operate artificial intelligence technologies.
Constraints on semiconductor product availability could adversely affect Amazon's ability to develop artificial intelligence products.
Constraints on semiconductor product availability could adversely affect Amazon's ability to operate artificial intelligence services.
Amazon could face claims due to violations by suppliers of applicable laws.
Amazon could face claims due to violations by other vendors of applicable laws.
Amazon could face claims due to violations by suppliers of contractual terms.
Amazon could face claims due to violations by other vendors of contractual terms.
Amazon could face claims due to violations by suppliers of intellectual property rights of others.
Amazon could face claims due to violations by other vendors of intellectual property rights of others.
Amazon could face claims due to violations by suppliers of Amazon's Supply Chain Standards.
Amazon could face claims due to violations by other vendors of Amazon's Supply Chain Standards.
Amazon's reputation could be damaged by suppliers' unethical products or practices.
Amazon's reputation could be damaged by other vendors' unethical products or practices.
Amazon's reputation could be damaged by suppliers' unsafe products or practices.
Amazon's reputation could be damaged by other vendors' unsafe products or practices.
Amazon's reputation could be damaged by suppliers' hazardous products or practices.
Amazon's reputation could be damaged by other vendors' hazardous products or practices.
Supplier or vendor violations could limit Amazon's growth.
Supplier or vendor violations could negatively affect Amazon's operating results.

topics.value: Amazon's Supply Chain Dependencies and Risks

statements.value: Amazon relies on a limited group of suppliers for semiconductor products.
Amazon's semiconductor suppliers include providers of graphics processing units.
Graphics processing units are products related to artificial intelligence infrastructure.
Constraints on semiconductor product availability could adversely affect Amazon's ability to develop artificial intelligence technologies.
Constraints on semiconductor product availability could adversely affect Amazon's ability to operate artificial intelligence technologies.
Constraints on semiconductor product availability could adversely affect Amazon's ability to develop artificial intelligence products.
Constraints on semiconductor product availability could adversely affect Amazon's ability to operate artificial intelligence services.
Amazon could face claims due to violations by suppliers of applicable laws.
Amazon could face claims due to violations by other vendors of applicable laws.
Amazon could face claims due to violations by suppliers of contractual terms.
Amazon could face claims due to violations by other vendors of contractual terms.
Amazon could face claims due to violations by suppliers of intellectual property rights of others.
Amazon could face claims due to violations by other vendors of intellectual property rights of others.
Amazon could face claims due to violations by suppliers of Amazon's Supply Chain Standards.
Amazon could face claims due to violations by other vendors of Amazon's Supply Chain Standards.
Amazon's reputation could be damaged by suppliers' unethical products or practices.
Amazon's reputation could be damaged by other vendors' unethical products or practices.
Amazon's reputation could be damaged by suppliers' unsafe products or practices.
Amazon's reputation could be damaged by other vendors' unsafe products or practices.
Amazon's reputation could be damaged by suppliers' hazardous products or practices.
Amazon's reputation could be damaged by other vendors' hazardous products or practices.
Supplier or vendor violations could limit Amazon's growth.
Supplier or vendor violations could negatively affect Amazon's operating results.

text: For example, we rely on a limited group of suppliers for semiconductor products, including products related to artificial intelligence infrastructure such as graphics processing units. Constraints on the availability of these products could adversely affect our ability to develop and operate artificial intelligence technologies, products, or services. In addition, violations by our suppliers or other vendors of applicable laws, regulations, contractual terms, intellectual property rights of others, or our Supply Chain Standards, as well as products or practices regarded as unethical, unsafe, or hazardous, could expose us to claims, damage our reputation, limit our growth, and negatively affect our operating results.
